displayName.text: Our Lady of Good Counsel Roman Catholic Church

formattedAddress: 230 E 90th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 230 E 90th St, New York, NY 10128-3503, USA

originalText.text: Catholic Underground event now host one a month as a franciscan friars of the renewal. The architecture itself of the building is very beautiful. The service at 7:30PM on Saturday was great and interesting. There is a part they turn off the light accept the state and sing blessing songs. It was super attractive and mysteries. At that night, the church was packed with tons of people especially the young people. After service we went downstairs to enjoy socializing and Jazz music.

originalText.text: As a cradle Catholic I truly enjoy this. I scratched past the surface somewhat different aspects of the religion. And I'm really able to get deep in prayer with some things not everything.  But Catholic Underground NYC adoration is very dear to me. I look forward to it every month until they break for Summer. Very fulfilling when you allow yourself to be centered there.  üôèüèæüôèüèæüôèüèæ

originalText.text: Only been for Catholic Underground run by the CFR.s, which if you haven't experienced you're missing out. At those events, the church is packed, not even standing room only. Hundreds of young adults pack the church for Adoration of the Blessed Sacrament and Confession. The CFR's lead music, and throughout the evening you pray Evening Prayer and Night Prayer. A concert follows in the basement after the Holy Hour. Incredible experience. It's beautiful to see the church packed on a Saturday night when they could be doing really anything else. Some beautiful images behind the main altar and reredos.

originalText.text:
So I kind of stumbled into Our Lady of Good Counsel after an exam this morning looking for a.m. mass in 10021 and to my good fortune OLOGC had 9am mass...hooray! ü§ó

Having visited this most beautiful church in the past for #CatholicUndergroundNYC, I was not aware of the cozy Lady Chapel that is open in the morning for morning mass. After mass the Holy Rosary and the Devine Mercy Chaplet was prayed in group with very kind locals and my heart was left full. Thank you for having me. üôèüåøü§óüòäüïäüåπ #GodIsTheBest

originalText.text: I am a Hospice Nurse in a near by Assisted Living (Hospice Floor) and we have been blessed to have a Priest (Fr Michael) come quickly to administer the last rites to our Catholic Patient when in need of it. Very grateful for their services. üôèüèª
